About Me

A BIT ABOUT ME:

BIO

I am a driven, goal-oriented Electrical Engineering Student and Entrepreneur. I have significant experience writing code in C and Python (both inside and outside the classroom), and a strong background with AVR microcontrollers. Working two summers as a student cancer researcher, and doing an internship with NRG Energy has provided me with data analytics skills applicable across many fields.

Assistant in Programming at Konnektiv Berlin

May 2018 - July 2018

  • HTML. CSS, and PHP Coding and Code Review
  • Technical development and expansion of multiple online community platforms
  • Research and editing for Konnektiv’s academic papers on Blockchain and digitization of the Congo-Nile trail

Web Developer at SMHeartCard Inc.

July 2018 - Present

  • Developed the website from the ground up on a Shopify backbone
  • Customized interface through backend to meet client demands (editing HTML, CSS, and Liquid source code)
  • Website maintenance, and implementation of new features including risk calculation software

Undergraduate Researcher at IS Goping Laboratory

July 2015 - October 2015 and July 2014 - August 2014

  • Lab technician and student researcher focusing on how mutations to the BCL-2 protein impacts Breast Cancer Cell growth
  • Gathered my own data and used Excel for statistical analysis and graph formation for my poster presentation and publication (University of Alberta Summer Student’s Research Day Abstract booklet).
